channel.title: Need a bit help
channel.description: How can i make my npcs drops rare and how do i make a npc to talk in NPChandler.java like for eg: i wana make a cow say moo!... If u can help me ill rep u (if i can... :rolleyes:)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2008, 10:01:33 am[/size][hr]ne 1 kind enuf to help...?

item.title: Need a bit help
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Npc drops- Drops.cfg.
NPC Dialogue-

                    if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID Here) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your text here";
                        }
                    }
